markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Emetic Paste](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1939)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 53 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

[Sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) creatures have difficulty swallowing, so you can Activate emetic paste by applying it to your skin or that of a sickened creature within reach, typically on the throat. The paste makes it easy for the sickened creature to purge, granting it an immediate Fortitude save to reduce its sickened condition. The paste grants the target an item bonus to that save and to all saving throws to reduce the sickened condition for 1 hour.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"
right="Item 2"
pfs="Standard"
>

</traits>

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +2.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Emetic Paste (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 53 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 120 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +3.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"

>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +4.
